title: I Remember You
description: (Please note this is a novella)**Mature Content Warning** Recommended for ages 17+ due to language and sexual content.Lance never got over his teenage love despite years of trying to forget her with alcohol, music, and other women.Samantha dated lots of different guys after Lance, guys most girls would love to have even a chance with. No one can make her happy though; she compares them all to Lance.Fate brings them together when Lance is in town for some family business. They end up spending a passionate night together but can they be more? Can they finally find their happily ever after?
author: Scarlett Metal
